title: Scaffolding Instructional Design for Developing Elementary Science Explanation Construction Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary science education content and basic instructional design principles
context.additional_context: Implementation of a project-based learning environment to enhance science explanation structuring skills for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can design elementary science explanation activities applying fading scaffolding strategies
Learners can develop science explanation evaluation rubrics integrating cognitive and linguistic elements
Learners can present differentiated gradual support strategies at three or more levels tailored to learner proficiency
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
